angel."},{"lineNumber":90883,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのままだと心が保たないでしょうね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you stay like this, your heart won't hold out, right?"},{"lineNumber":90884,"originalJapaneseLine":"　果てはその命を自ら潰えさせる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, you might even end your own life...\""},

{"lineNumber":90885,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、貴方の心に何が必要なのか分かる？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you know what your heart needs right now?"},

{"lineNumber":90886,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何を求めているのか……","translatedEnglishLine":"What it is seeking...\""},

{"lineNumber":90887,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは絶望よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It is despair."},

{"lineNumber":90888,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それも……","translatedEnglishLine":"And not just any,"},

{"lineNumber":90889,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黒く、熱く、純粋で、甘い絶望」","translatedEnglishLine":"a black, hot, pure, and sweet despair.\""},{"lineNumber":90890,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-Ah...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って、どれのことだったのかしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...So, which one was it again?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「機械オンチだ、機械オンチ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm hopeless with machines, hopeless with machines..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相性が悪いだけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's just a matter of bad compatibility, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかも負けず嫌いだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And on top of that, I'm a sore loser..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスのとある村に、一人の未亡人がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a certain village of Lisas, there was a widow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夫は今回の戦争で失った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She lost her husband in this recent war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇敢な人ではなかったが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wasn't a brave man,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこまでも優しく朗らかな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but gentle and cheerful to the very end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女だけが愛した夫。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the husband she alone loved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夫の死亡通知書が届いたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The death notice of that husband arrived,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう半月も前のことだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it had already been half a month ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々駆け落ちで結婚した仲だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had originally gotten married by eloping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛さえあれば怖いものはないと思っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She believed there was nothing to fear as long as there was love.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛に勝るものはないと自惚れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was conceited enough to think nothing surpasses love.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛の名の下に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under the name of love,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな苦難とも戦えると……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she thought she could fight against any hardship...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふっ……笑っちゃうわね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh... it makes me laugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争という名の大きな時代のうねりがあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a great upheaval of the era called war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに一組の夫婦が何も抗う術なく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against it, a couple had no means to resist,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ呑み込まれていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were simply swallowed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女はそう思っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was what she believed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦争に比べたら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Compared to war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛なんて本当にちっぽけ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: love is truly so tiny..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、それは違うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, that's not true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛に勝るものはこの世にないのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nothing in this world surpasses love."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんにちは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hello."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけば少女が室内にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before she knew it, a girl was inside the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな田舎の村には不似合いな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dressed in deep black clothing, she was like a doll, a beautiful girl unsuitable for such a countryside village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 漆黒の衣装に包まれた人形のように綺麗な少女。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A beautiful girl wrapped in jet-black clothes, like a doll.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見覚えはない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She didn't recognize her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お嬢ちゃん……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Little miss...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方、どこから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where did you come from...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、貴方、笑ってるわよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you're smiling, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くす、お顔よ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, your face...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニコニコと笑ってる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is smiling brightly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の心はそんなに泣いているのにね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though your heart is crying that much?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハッとして、未亡人がアムの顔を見返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Startled, the widow looked back into Amu's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこまでも澄み、見通す、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girl had angelic eyes, clear and penetrating,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 天使様の瞳を持つ少女だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with the eyes of an angel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのままだと心が保たないでしょうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you stay like this, your heart won't hold out, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果てはその命を自ら潰えさせる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, you might even end your own life..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、貴方の心に何が必要なのか分かる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know what your heart needs right now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を求めているのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What it is seeking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは絶望よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And not just any,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒く、熱く、純粋で、甘い絶望」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a black, hot, pure, and sweet despair."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dressed in deep black clothing, she was like a doll, a beautiful girl unsuitable for such a countryside village.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A beautiful girl wrapped in jet-black clothes, like a doll.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見覚えはない。

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くす、お顔よ……

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニコニコと笑ってる」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though your heart is crying that much?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you stay like this, your heart won't hold out, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果てはその命を自ら潰えさせる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, you might even end your own life..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you know what your heart needs right now?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を求めているのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What it is seeking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは絶望よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It is despair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And not just any,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒く、熱く、純粋で、甘い絶望」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a black, hot, pure, and sweet despair."
